name: Reflective Conversation Demo
description: A slower-paced conversation with thoughtful pauses and deeper reflection.

script.text: Let's take a moment to center ourselves. Today, I'd like us to explore what balance means to each of you.
Balance... that's something I've been thinking about a lot lately. For me, it feels like this constant struggle between who I think I should be at work and who I actually am.
I relate to that. Sometimes I wonder if I even know what balance looks like anymore. My business has become my entire identity.
Those are profound observations. Can you think of a moment recently when you felt truly balanced, even if it was brief?
Actually... yes. Last Sunday morning, I was just sitting with my coffee, no phone, no laptop. Just watching the birds outside. For those few minutes, I wasn't worried about anything.
That sounds peaceful. I can't remember the last time I allowed myself that kind of stillness.
What would it take for you to create more of those moments in your life?
